current.paragraph:
I am at Brown University this spring, finishing my degrees in math and computer science. Over winter break I travelled with my family to Vietnam, and then attended my first ever JMM. From there, I was off to Pittsburgh where I stayed at the nicest institution the city has to offer. I did my new outdoor experience of the month, which was learning how to ski (ish ish ish) in the North Country of New York. In a shocking conclusion, I watched live what will surely be the craziest sports feat I ever see in person on my Chicagoan grandmother's 95th birthday.
And now I'm in Providence, and there is no place I'd rather be.
courses: Recent Applications of Probability and Statistics

past.paragraph: I am at Brown University this autumn, continuing my degrees in math and computer science. Over the summer I was at Montana State University trying to make metabolic data easier to interpret and running about. I also enjoyed attending Invisible College.
